name: Cranberry-Almond-Flax Oat Bars
author: Quaker®
summary: These oat bars studded with cranberries, sliced almonds, and ground flax seeds make for a great on-the-go snack, with no baking required!
ingredients: 2 cups Quaker® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
directions: In large bowl, stir together oats, flax seeds, cinnamon, and ginger
In small bowl, stir together almond butter, water, honey, and almond extract
Add to oat mixture and stir to combine well
Let stand 5 minutes or until mixture holds together when pressed
Line 8x4-inch loaf pan with foil, leaving some foil hanging over sides
Press oat mixture evenly into pan
Top with sliced almonds, pressing lightly
Refrigerate until firm and set, about 2 hours
To serve, remove oat mixture from pan
Cut in half lengthwise, then crosswise into 12 pieces
Store, covered, at room temperature up to 2 days or refrigerate, covered, up to 1 week
